alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 19 at 1:56PM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Near zero visibilities in heavier snow showers. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Wind chills dropping into single digits tonight. * WHERE...Cass MI, St. Joseph MI, and Berrien Counties. * WHEN...This afternoon into tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow covered roads. Areas of blowing snow and heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
